text: Hasan Amid, the author of Amid Dictionary Amid dictionary () is a two volume dictionary of Persian language, written by Hasan Amid. The dictionary was first published in 1963. Hasan Amid had previously published a dictionary titled Farhang-e No (lit. New Dictionary) in 1954, but the most complete dictionary published by him is Amid Dictionary (1963). It was republished in 2010 under the supervision of Farhad Ghorbanzadeh, who is a member of Dehkhoda Dictionary Institute. ==References== Persian Wikipedia article Category:1963 non-fiction books Category:Persian dictionaries Category:Iranian books Category:Persian books
title: Amid dictionary
